iplb_home_tile_configuration_billing_evo: The pricing for your Load Balancer is changing, and its prices are going down.
iplb_home_tile_configuration_billing_iss: Our OVHcloud Load Balancer solution experienced technical issues during the last few months, which affected your billing. We apologise for the inconvenience.

As a result, until 01 May, we will not charge for any excess traffic that has not been billed. From 01 May, billing will resume in accordance with the Special Terms and Conditions of Service, and the new detailed pricing in effect
